chinese: 该公司的资源分配得并不平均
english: the company's resources have been unevenly distributed

chinese: 这个金发美女很有风格，魅力十足
english: this beautiful blonde girl has so much style and glamor

chinese: 他盗窃公司财物的事情被揭露了
english: the revelation that he stole from his company was exposed

chinese: 这个家庭靠农场的农产品为生
english: this family's livelihood depends on the produce from the farm

chinese: 我用了很长一段时间的默认头像
english: i used the default profile photo for a long time
she raised her hand to answer the teacher's question

chinese: the cars collided because the road was slippery
她放弃当医生后，开始了新的作家生涯
english: she embarked on a new career as a writer after quitting as a doctor

chinese: 太阳强烈的光线让它无法直视
english: the sun's glare made it hard to see

chinese: 别站得离陡峭的悬崖太近了
english: don't go too close to the edge of the steep cliff

chinese: 球场外对立的粉丝们开始聚集，一场冲突正在酝酿之中
english: trouble was brewing outside the stadium as rival fans were gathering

chinese: 这通诈骗电话的目的是骗取钱财
english: the fraudulent call is to get money by deception
